channel.title: HELP! With password encryption
channel.description:
Ok I am using dodian server atm and i got 1400+ reg users, Now I am switching to a diff source and the password encryption looks way diffrent.
How can I get dodians password encryption that way I can just transfer the char files over and people wont have trouble?
I tried to delete the Encryption.java and class file and replaced it with the dodian one but when I reg a new acc it still comes out different from dodians
Please help!!!

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @wittynight wittynight
item.description:
@wittynight wrote:

open client.java and search for “hashp”
delete those two little lines …

credit to some smart guy who answered this for me

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Not also do you have to change the encryption, you also have to change everything in the characters file thats not in your new one like playerlooks

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

If you don’t want them to lose there characters, your going to have to change 1.4k+ Regular user passwords.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Thats not possible! It has to work

I have changed peoples pass b4, they tell me what they want I log into a lvl 3 with their pass and log out, open the lvl 3s char file take the encrypted pass and paste it into their char file and it works. I need to change the servers encryption, there has to be a way like right now the dodian uses ex: 28047e796a977d30f8
and the new source I got uses ex: 195-251-154-181-158-92-169-138

How can I change the encryption type to be ex: 28047e796a977d30f8 and not in 232-232-232-232

I know there is a way. I really need to xfer all the chars to new server but it wont work if the encryption is diff.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“elitescouter, post:5, topic:167816”]What im saying is…

I am transfering all the accs to a new source.
I want the passes to be the same from old source onto the new 1.
The old one was dodian, now I have a different encryption on the new source.
I want people to keep their old passes.
I need to change the new source to dodians encryption.

Please help[/quote]

Sorry you can’t the person wouldn’t be able to log on, they have to start all over again.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

What im saying is…

I am transfering all the accs to a new source.
I want the passes to be the same from old source onto the new 1.
The old one was dodian, now I have a different encryption on the new source.
I want people to keep their old passes.
I need to change the new source to dodians encryption.

Please help

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Once you delete the encrypted passwords, no one can login there accounts because it would say “invalid password or username”, so you would have to delete all your char files.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

I dont need to un-encrypt, can I just change the encryption so the new server reads the dodians encryption? Idk about what their passes are I just want to transfer their accs to the new server.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! With password encryption
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

tell me your server ip and port and i will help you, i just want to know if you are lying or not

some n33bs just ask how to unencrypt passwords so they can hack rs2 accounts

Read full topic
